SELECT
MT_IN.IN_CODE AS inCode, MT_IN.MT_CODE AS mtCode, (SELECT MT_NAME FROM MT WHERE MT.MT_CODE = MT_IN.MT_CODE) AS mtName, MT_IN.CP_CODE AS cpCode, MT_IN.INQUANTITY AS inquantity, MT_IN.INPUT_DATE AS inputDate, MT_IN.ED AS ed, MT_IN.LOT_NO AS lotNo, MT_IN.COMM AS comm, MTL_OD.MTL_OD_CODE FROM MT_IN JOIN MTL_OD ON MT_IN.MTL_OD_CODE = MTL_OD.MTL_OD_CODE WHERE MTL_OD.MTL_OD_STATUS = '입고품질검사완료'
